# RLS { #water_tank.rules.RLS.RLS }

`rules.RLS.RLS(self, projection, delta=1e-06)`

Recursive least-squares (RLS) learning rule for FORCE learning.

## Parameters

| Name         | Type       | Description                                       | Default    |
|--------------|------------|---------------------------------------------------|------------|
| `projection` | Projection | projection on which to apply the learning rule.   | _required_ |
| `delta`      | float      | initial diagonal value of the correlation matrix. | `1e-06`    |

## Methods

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [train](#water_tank.rules.RLS.RLS.train) | Applies one step of the RLS learning rule. |

### train { #water_tank.rules.RLS.RLS.train }

`rules.RLS.RLS.train(error)`

Applies one step of the RLS learning rule.

#### Parameters

| Name    | Type       | Description                              | Default    |
|---------|------------|------------------------------------------|------------|
| `error` | np.ndarray | error vector at the post-synaptic level. | _required_ |
